{{doomwiki}}[[Image:Junko-MAP05-ImpCastleCourtyard.jpg|right|thumb|230px]] [[Image:Junko-MAP07-Troopers.jpg|right|thumb|230px]] {{Wad | name = Junko | author = Fizz, [[User:TOGoS|TOGoS]] | iwad = Doom2 | type = m | status = Released | link = [http://www.nuke24.net/projects/Junko/ official project page]
{{idgames|id=16013}} }} '''Junko''', a.k.a. '''Janitor Adventure 3D''', is a multi-level PWAD for Doom2 developed between 2004 and 2010. Much of the level design is in a similar (but more refined) style to that of [[Crapi]] and, like Crapi, gameplay is very open-ended. Adventuring through the world of Junko, the player must explore vast labyrinths of rivers, caves, and tech bases in his quest to find a way home.
